nodes.text: Graven R'ube was a Y'bith and a patron at Chalmun's Cantina. R'ube was present in the cantina around 1 ABY, when the Imperial curfew went into effect. The Y'bith left the establishment during Ackmena's final performance of Goodnight, But Not Goodbye, together with a drunken Caldera Righim.

This alien's face was made from a modified Bith mask. The name, which was first revealed in the blog The Star Wars Holiday Special Cantina: Who's Who, is an anagram of Evan Burger, author of the What's The Story? entry on the Y'bith.
